MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL58 postcode area of Beaumaris, affecting a small number of  properties in the surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8.30PM due to a broken piece of equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 10.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.58PM on 20th October 2020.
